name: Flappy Bat (Bastian Top)
description:
This game was made to demonstrate a Tutorial as on how to make Flappy Bird from start to finish. The Tutorial link is below:

You will learn the following things:

-Main mechanics of the bird
-Spawning enemies (Pipes)
-Making backgrounds with a parallax effect
-Adding a score and high score counter
-Creating a main menu
-Adding sounds/music/particle effects to polish the game

You can download the assets below:

https://tinyurl.com/y9sztd3x
